column4: Is anyone here having any issues with firefox? It seems that running 2.6.11, each time I close firefox after doing some browsing, my entire system locks up.
firefox has been a little unstable for me recently, but I put it down to my system being hacked to death
Hacked to death? In what manner? This is a fresh hoary install. Perhaps I need to redo my iptables
I meant that my installation of warty is hacked to death :)
